---
description: Yami UI Component Library
alwaysApply: true
applyTo: "**"
version: 1.0.0
---

# Yami UI - Component Library

## Color Theme

| Variable | Light | Dark |
|----------|--------|--------|
| `--background` | oklch(98.5% 0.008 280) | oklch(0.1743 0.0227 283.7998) |
| `--foreground` | oklch(0.25 0.02 280) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--card` | oklch(99.5% 0.002 280) | oklch(0.2284 0.0384 282.9324) |
| `--card-foreground` | oklch(0.25 0.02 280) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--popover` | oklch(99.8% 0.001 280) | oklch(0.2284 0.0384 282.9324) |
| `--popover-foreground` | oklch(0.25 0.02 280) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--primary` | oklch(0.55 0.22 285) | oklch(0.7162 0.1597 290.3962) |
| `--primary-foreground` | oklch(0.99 0 0) | oklch(0.1743 0.0227 283.7998) |
| `--secondary` | oklch(65.211% 0.19064 286.761) | oklch(0.3139 0.0736 283.4591) |
| `--secondary-foreground` | oklch(0.99 0 0) | oklch(0.8367 0.0849 285.9111) |
| `--muted` | oklch(0.96 0.015 285) | oklch(0.271 0.0621 281.4377) |
| `--muted-foreground` | oklch(0.5 0.04 285) | oklch(0.7166 0.0462 285.1741) |
| `--accent` | oklch(0.93 0.055 270) | oklch(0.3354 0.0828 280.9705) |
| `--accent-foreground` | oklch(0.25 0.02 280) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--destructive` | oklch(63.408% 0.23096 22.528) | oklch(0.6861 0.2061 14.9941) |
| `--destructive-foreground` | oklch(0.99 0 0) | oklch(1 0 0) |
| `--border` | oklch(0.92 0.018 285) | oklch(0.3261 0.0597 282.5832) |
| `--input` | oklch(0.92 0.018 285) | oklch(0.3261 0.0597 282.5832) |
| `--ring` | oklch(0.55 0.22 285) | oklch(0.7162 0.1597 290.3962) |
| `--chart-1` | oklch(0.55 0.22 285) | oklch(0.7162 0.1597 290.3962) |
| `--chart-2` | oklch(0.65 0.18 275) | oklch(0.6382 0.1047 274.9117) |
| `--chart-3` | oklch(0.6 0.25 290) | oklch(0.7482 0.1235 244.7492) |
| `--chart-4` | oklch(0.7 0.15 265) | oklch(0.7124 0.0977 186.6761) |
| `--chart-5` | oklch(0.48 0.2 295) | oklch(0.7546 0.1831 346.8124) |
| `--sidebar` | oklch(0.97 0.012 285) | oklch(0.2284 0.0384 282.9324) |
| `--sidebar-foreground` | oklch(0.25 0.02 280) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--sidebar-primary` | oklch(0.55 0.22 285) | oklch(0.7162 0.1597 290.3962) |
| `--sidebar-primary-foreground` | oklch(0.99 0 0) | oklch(0.1743 0.0227 283.7998) |
| `--sidebar-accent` | oklch(0.93 0.055 270) | oklch(0.3354 0.0828 280.9705) |
| `--sidebar-accent-foreground` | oklch(0.25 0.02 280) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--sidebar-border` | oklch(0.92 0.018 285) | oklch(0.3261 0.0597 282.5832) |
| `--sidebar-ring` | oklch(0.55 0.22 285) | oklch(0.7162 0.1597 290.3962) |
| `--font-sans` | Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif | Inter, sans-serif |
| `--font-serif` | Georgia, Cambria, serif | Georgia, serif |
| `--font-mono` | 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Code', monospace | JetBrains Mono, monospace |
| `--radius` | 0 | 0.5rem |
| `--shadow-2xs` | 0px 1px 2px 0px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.05) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.06) |
| `--shadow-xs` | 0px 2px 4px 0px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.06) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.06) |
| `--shadow-sm` | 0px 2px 6px -1px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.08), 0px 4px 8px -2px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.08) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12), 0px 1px 2px -1px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12) |
| `--shadow` | 0px 4px 12px -2px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.1), 0px 2px 6px -1px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.08) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12), 0px 1px 2px -1px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12) |
| `--shadow-md` | 0px 6px 16px -4px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.12), 0px 4px 8px -2px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.08) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12), 0px 2px 4px -1px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12) |
| `--shadow-lg` | 0px 10px 24px -6px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.14), 0px 6px 12px -3px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.1) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12), 0px 4px 6px -1px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12) |
| `--shadow-xl` | 0px 16px 32px -8px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.16), 0px 8px 16px -4px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.12) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12), 0px 8px 10px -1px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.12) |
| `--shadow-2xl` | 0px 24px 48px -12px oklch(0.3 0.02 280 / 0.24) | 0px 4px 10px 0px hsl(240 30% 25% / 0.3) |
| `--success` | oklch(0.75 0.15 150) | oklch(0.65 0.16 150) |
| `--success-foreground` | oklch(0.2 0.03 150) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--info` | oklch(0.78 0.12 250) | oklch(0.68 0.14 250) |
| `--info-foreground` | oklch(0.2 0.04 250) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--warning` | oklch(0.86 0.14 80) | oklch(0.76 0.15 80) |
| `--warning-foreground` | oklch(0.25 0.05 80) | oklch(0.9185 0.0257 285.8834) |
| `--error` | var(--destructive) | oklch(0.63 0.23 22.528) |
| `--error-foreground` | var(--destructive-foreground) | oklch(0.98 0 0) |

## Components

### button
用于触发操作的主按钮组件，支持多种尺寸与颜色变体

[button docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/button)

**Usage:** 在表单提交、弹窗确认、交互操作等场景使用

#### Class Names
- `btn`
- `btn-primary`
- `btn-secondary`
- `btn-destructive`
- `btn-muted`
- `btn-accent`
- `btn-outline`
- `btn-ghost`
- `btn-xs`
- `btn-sm`
- `btn-md`
- `btn-lg`
- `btn-xl`
- `btn-left`
- `btn-center`
- `btn-right`
- `btn-link`
- `btn-icon`
- `btn-icon-xs`
- `btn-icon-sm`
- `btn-icon-md`
- `btn-icon-lg`
- `btn-icon-xl`
- `btn-pill`
- `btn-square`
- `btn-full`
- `btn-wide`
- `btn-shadow`
- `btn-lift`
- `btn-loading`
- `btn-group`

#### Syntax
```html
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-md">确认</button>
```

---

### dropdown
下拉菜单组件，用于显示可选项或操作菜单

[dropdown docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/dropdown)

**Usage:** 适用于按钮菜单、导航菜单、筛选选项等场景

#### Class Names
- `dropdown`
- `dropdown-content`
- `dropdown-bottom`
- `dropdown-top`
- `dropdown-start`
- `dropdown-end`
- `dropdown-center`

#### Syntax
```html
<details class="dropdown w-36">
  <summary class="btn btn-primary">Dropdown 示例</summary>
  <div class="dropdown-content menu p-2 border rounded shadow-md">
    <li><a href="#" class="">菜单项 1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#" class="">菜单项 2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#" class="">菜单项 3</a></li>
  </div>
</details>
```

---

### fab
悬浮操作按钮（Floating Action Button）

[fab docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/fab)

**Usage:** 在界面右下角展示主要操作，如“新建”、“添加”等

#### Class Names
- `fab`
- `fab-flower`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="fab right-48">
  <!-- 主按钮 -->
  <button tabindex="0" class="btn btn-primary rounded-full size-14 shadow-lg">
    <Plus class="w-6 h-6" />
  </button>

  <!-- 子操作项 -->
  <button class="btn btn-secondary rounded-full size-12 shadow-md">
    <Edit class="w-5 h-5" />
  </button>
  <button class="btn btn-accent rounded-full size-12 shadow-md">
    <Share2 class="w-5 h-5" />
  </button>
  <button class="btn btn-destructive rounded-full size-12 shadow-md">
    <Trash2 class="w-5 h-5" />
  </button>
</div>
```

---

### modal
模态对话框组件，用于展示重要信息或确认操作

[modal docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/modal)

**Usage:** 在需要用户确认或输入的场景中使用

#### Class Names
- `modal`
- `modal-body`
- `modal-body-sm`
- `modal-body-md`
- `modal-body-lg`
- `modal-body-xl`
- `modal-body-full`
- `modal-header`
- `modal-title`
- `modal-close`
- `modal-content`
- `modal-footer`
- `modal-bounce`
- `modal-blur`

#### Syntax
```html
<button class="btn modal-control" onclick="my_modal_1.showModal()">
  open modal
</button>
<dialog id="my_modal_1" class="modal" v-click-modal-outside>
  <div class="modal-body modal-body-md">
    <h3 class="text-lg font-bold">Hello!</h3>
  </div>
</dialog>
```

---

### swap
动画切换组件，用于图标、文本或元素的可视状态切换

[swap docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/swap)

**Usage:** 适用于收藏、开关、加载等交互场景

#### Class Names
- `swap`
- `swap-active`
- `swap-rotate`
- `swap-flip`

#### Syntax
```html
<label class="swap">
  <input type="checkbox" />
  <div class="swap-on">ON</div>
  <div class="swap-off">OFF</div>
</label>
- 支持 swap-active, swap-rotate, swap-flip 等变体
```

#### Rules
- 支持 swap-active, swap-rotate, swap-flip 等变体

---

### avatar
头像组件，用于显示用户头像、图标或缩略图。

[avatar docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/avatar)

**Usage:** 常用于个人资料、聊天列表、评论区等用户展示场景。

#### Class Names
- `avatar`
- `avatar-xs`
- `avatar-sm`
- `avatar-md`
- `avatar-lg`
- `avatar-xl`
- `avatar-2xl`
- `avatar-square`
- `avatar-rounded`
- `avatar-ring`
- `avatar-ring-primary`
- `avatar-ring-destructive`
- `avatar-ring-accent`
- `avatar-status`
- `avatar-status-online`
- `avatar-status-offline`
- `avatar-status-busy`
- `avatar-status-away`
- `avatar-group`
- `avatar-group-compact`
- `avatar-hover`
- `avatar-clickable`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="avatar">
  <img src="/images/avatar.png" alt="用户头像" />
</div>
```

---

### badge
徽章组件，用于显示状态、小计或通知数量。

[badge docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/badge)

**Usage:** 常见于按钮、图标、标签旁显示数量或状态。

#### Class Names
- `badge`
- `badge-primary`
- `badge-secondary`
- `badge-destructive`
- `badge-muted`
- `badge-accent`
- `badge-info`
- `badge-success`
- `badge-error`
- `badge-warning`
- `badge-outline`
- `badge-ghost`
- `badge-xs`
- `badge-sm`
- `badge-md`
- `badge-lg`
- `badge-xl`
- `badge-pill`
- `badge-square`
- `badge-dot`
- `badge-closable`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="badge badge-primary">新</div>
<span class="badge badge-secondary badge-outline">Beta</span>
```

---

### card
卡片组件，用于容纳图文、操作等内容块。

[card docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/card)

**Usage:** 常用于仪表盘、商品列表、信息展示区。

#### Class Names
- `card`
- `card-header`
- `card-title`
- `card-title-deco`
- `card-title-deco-destructive`
- `card-description`
- `card-body`
- `card-footer`
- `card-hover`
- `card-clickable`
- `card-borderless`
- `card-primary`
- `card-secondary`
- `card-destructive`
- `card-accent`
- `card-muted`
- `card-sm`
- `card-md`
- `card-lg`
- `card-glass`
- `card-gradient`
- `card-shadow`
- `card-shadow-lg`
- `card-header-bordered`
- `card-header-center`
- `card-header-row`
- `card-footer-bordered`
- `card-footer-center`
- `card-footer-between`
- `card-image`
- `card-image-sm`
- `card-image-md`
- `card-image-lg`
- `card-grid`
- `card-grid-compact`
- `card-grid-relaxed`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="card">
  <div class="card-header">
    <h3 class="card-title">默认卡片</h3>
    <p class="card-description">最基础的卡片样式。</p>
  </div>
  <div class="card-body">这是卡片内容。</div>
  <div class="card-footer">
    <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary">操作</button>
  </div>
  <p class="text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-2 px-6">使用类：<code>card</code></p>
</div>
```

---

### carousel
轮播组件，用于展示多张图片或内容滑块。

[carousel docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/carousel)

**Usage:** 适用于图片展示、横幅、广告位、产品展示等。

#### Class Names
- `carousel`
- `carousel-container`
- `carousel-item`
- `carousel-navigation`
- `carousel-btn`
- `carousel-btn-prev`
- `carousel-btn-next`
- `carousel-indicators`
- `carousel-indicator`
- `carousel-indicator-active`
- `carousel-fade`
- `carousel-cards`
- `carousel-cards-responsive`
- `carousel-center`
- `carousel-sm`
- `carousel-md`
- `carousel-lg`
- `carousel-fullscreen`
- `carousel-indicator-progress`
- `carousel-caption`
- `carousel-caption-title`
- `carousel-caption-description`
- `carousel-thumbnails`
- `carousel-thumbnail`
- `carousel-thumbnail-active`
- `carousel-vertical`
- `carousel-3d`
- `carousel-loop`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="carousel carousel-md">
  <div class="carousel-container">
    <div class="carousel-item" v-for="i in 3" :key="i">
      <img
        :src="`https://picsum.photos/seed/${i}/800/400`"
        :alt="`Slide ${i}`"
        class="w-full h-full object-cover"
      />
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="carousel-navigation">
    <button class="carousel-btn-prev" aria-label="Previous">←</button>
    <button class="carousel-btn-next" aria-label="Next">→</button>
  </div>

  <div class="carousel-indicators">
    <button>1</button>
    <button>2</button>
    <button>3</button>
  </div>
</div>
```

---

### chat
聊天气泡组件，用于展示会话消息。

[chat docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/chat)

**Usage:** 常用于消息中心、客服聊天、社交互动等。

#### Class Names
- `chat`
- `chat-bubble`
- `chat-image`
- `chat-header`
- `chat-footer`
- `chat-start`
- `chat-end`
- `chat-bubble-primary`
- `chat-bubble-muted`
- `chat-bubble-accent`
- `chat-bubble-destructive`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="chat chat-start">
  <img src="https://i.pravatar.cc/40?img=3" class="chat-image" />
  <div>
    <div class="chat-header">Alice</div>
    <div class="chat-bubble">嗨～ 你今天怎么样？</div>
    <div class="chat-footer">10:23</div>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="chat chat-end">
  <div>
    <div class="chat-header">我</div>
    <div class="chat-bubble chat-bubble-primary">挺好的，谢谢！你呢？</div>
    <div class="chat-footer">10:24</div>
  </div>
  <img src="https://i.pravatar.cc/40?img=3" class="chat-image" />
</div>

<div class="chat chat-start">
  <div class="chat-bubble chat-bubble-destructive">系统提示：连接中断，请稍后重试。</div>
</div>
```

---

### collapse
折叠面板组件，用于隐藏/展开内容区域。

[collapse docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/collapse)

**Usage:** 适用于过滤器、设置项、帮助文档等场景。

#### Class Names
- `collapse`
- `collapse-title`
- `collapse-content`
- `collapse-arrow`
- `collapse-plus`
- `collapse-open`
- `collapse-close`
- `collapse-primary`
- `collapse-secondary`
- `collapse-accent`
- `collapse-destructive`
- `collapse-muted`
- `collapse-bordered`
- `collapse-shadow`
- `collapse-sm`
- `collapse-lg`
- `collapse-group`
- `collapse-group-compact`
- `collapse-hover`
- `collapse-disabled`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="bg-card rounded-xl border border-border p-6 shadow-sm">
<div class="mb-4 pb-3 border-b border-border">
  <h3 class="font-semibold text-lg">默认样式</h3>
  <p class="text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-1">
    最简单的折叠面板，无边框无图标
  </p>
</div>

<div class="collapse">
  <input type="checkbox" />
  <div class="collapse-title text-lg font-medium">
    点击展开查看详情
  </div>
  <div class="collapse-content">
    <p class="text-muted-foreground">
      这是折叠面板的内容区域。使用
      <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 bg-muted rounded text-xs font-mono"
        >input[type="checkbox"]</code
      >
      实现展开/收起功能。
    </p>
  </div>
</div>
        </div>
```

---

### kbd
键盘提示组件，用于展示快捷键或键盘操作说明。

[kbd docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/kbd)

**Usage:** 在表单提示、文档、快捷说明中使用。

#### Class Names
- `kbd`
- `kbd-primary`
- `kbd-secondary`
- `kbd-destructive`
- `kbd-muted`
- `kbd-flat`
- `kbd-xs`
- `kbd-sm`
- `kbd-md`
- `kbd-lg`
- `kbd-group`
- `kbd-command`
- `kbd-shift`
- `kbd-ctrl`
- `kbd-alt`
- `kbd-option`
- `kbd-enter`
- `kbd-delete`
- `kbd-escape`
- `kbd-tab`
- `kbd-caps`
- `kbd-up`
- `kbd-down`
- `kbd-left`
- `kbd-right`

#### Syntax
```html
<kbd class="kbd">A</kbd>
```

---

### list
列表组件，用于展示项目集合或菜单项。

[list docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/list)

**Usage:** 用于导航菜单、侧边栏、选项列表。

#### Class Names
- `list`
- `list-row`
- `list-col-grow`
- `list-col-wrap`
- `list-borderless`
- `list-hoverable`
- `list-compact`
- `list-relaxed`
- `list-zebra`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="list">
<div class="list-row">
  <div class="font-medium">用户名</div>
  <div class="list-col-grow text-muted-foreground">
    邮箱
  </div>
</div>
- 支持 list-decimal, list-disc, list-none
- 支持 list-inside, list-outside
```

#### Rules
- 支持 list-decimal, list-disc, list-none
- 支持 list-inside, list-outside

---

### stat
统计数据展示组件，用于显示指标和数值。

[stat docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/stat)

**Usage:** 用于仪表盘、业绩报表、数据总览。

#### Class Names
- `stats`
- `stat`
- `stat-figure`
- `stat-title`
- `stat-value`
- `stat-desc`
- `stat-actions`
- `stats-vertical`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="stats w-full">
<div class="stat">
  <div class="stat-figure text-primary"><Users /></div>
  <div class="stat-title">活跃用户</div>
  <div class="stat-value">2,430</div>
  <div class="stat-desc"><TrendingUp class="w-3 h-3" /> +12% 本月</div>
</div>

<div class="stat">
  <div class="stat-figure text-accent"><ShoppingBag /></div>
  <div class="stat-title">订单量</div>
  <div class="stat-value">312</div>
  <div class="stat-desc text-muted-foreground">昨日完成 289 单</div>
</div>

<div class="stat">
  <div class="stat-figure text-destructive"><DollarSign /></div>
  <div class="stat-title">收入</div>
  <div class="stat-value">$4.2k</div>
  <div class="stat-desc stat-desc-error"><TrendingDown class="w-3 h-3" /> -5% 本周</div>
</div>
</div>
```

---

### table
表格组件，用于展示结构化数据。

[table docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/table)

**Usage:** 用于后台管理、数据分析、信息列表。

#### Class Names
- `table`
- `table-zebra`
- `table-hover`
- `table-pin-rows`
- `table-pin-cols`
- `table-compact`
- `table-comfortable`
- `table-primary`
- `table-secondary`
- `table-accent`
- `table-destructive`
- `table-borderless`
- `table-bordered`
- `table-horizontal`
- `table-vertical`
- `table-center`
- `table-right`
- `table-selectable`
- `table-highlight`
- `table-container`
- `table-loading`
- `table-empty`
- `table-sortable`
- `table-card`
- `table-xs`
- `table-sm`
- `table-md`
- `table-lg`
- `table-xl`

#### Syntax
```html
<table class="table">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>姓名</th>
      <th>职位</th>
      <th>状态</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Alice</td>
      <td>前端</td>
      <td>在线</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
- 支持 table-zebra, table-compact, table-fixed
- 支持 hover、striped、bordered 样式
```

#### Rules
- 支持 table-zebra, table-compact, table-fixed
- 支持 hover、striped、bordered 样式

---

### timeline
时间线组件，用于展示时间顺序事件。

[timeline docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/timeline)

**Usage:** 适用于项目进度、活动节点、历史记录。

#### Class Names
- `timeline`
- `timeline-item`
- `timeline-line`
- `timeline-start`
- `timeline-middle`
- `timeline-end`
- `timeline-box`
- `timeline-icon`
- `timeline-dot`
- `timeline-primary`
- `timeline-secondary`
- `timeline-accent`
- `timeline-muted`
- `timeline-vertical`
- `timeline-horizontal`
- `timeline-compact`
- `timeline-sm`
- `timeline-lg`
- `timeline-line-dashed`
- `timeline-line-dotted`
- `timeline-animated`
- `timeline-rounded`
- `timeline-alternate`

#### Syntax
```html
<div
        class="timeline timeline-horizontal bg-card p-8 rounded-lg shadow-sm"
      >
  <div class="timeline-item">
    <div class="timeline-line bg-gray-300"></div>
    <div class="timeline-start">
      <div
        class="timeline-box bg-card border rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-sm"
      >
        <div class="font-semibold">项目启动</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="timeline-middle">
      <div
        class="w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-blue-600 flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm"
      >
        1
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="timeline-line bg-gray-300"></div>
  </div>
</div>
```

---

### alert
警告提示组件，用于展示重要信息、警告或状态提示。

[alert docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/alert)

**Usage:** 常用于表单验证、系统提示、操作结果反馈等。

#### Class Names
- `alert`
- `alert-title`
- `alert-description`
- `alert-close`
- `alert-info`
- `alert-success`
- `alert-warning`
- `alert-error`
- `alert-filled`
- `alert-sm`
- `alert-lg`
- `alert-no-icon`
- `alert-borderless`
- `alert-enter`
- `alert-enter-active`
- `alert-enter-to`
- `alert-leave`
- `alert-leave-active`
- `alert-leave-to`
- `alert-fade-enter`
- `alert-fade-enter-active`
- `alert-fade-enter-to`
- `alert-fade-leave`
- `alert-fade-leave-active`
- `alert-fade-leave-to`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="alert alert-info">
  <div>
    <div class="alert-title">信息提示</div>
    <div class="alert-description">这是一条信息提示内容。</div>
  </div>
  <div class="alert-close"></div>
</div>
```

---

### hover-card
悬浮卡片组件，用于在悬停时展示额外内容。

[hover-card docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/hover-card)

**Usage:** 常用于显示用户简介、商品预览、提示信息等。

#### Class Names
- `hover-card`
- `hover-card`
- `hover-card-center`
- `hover-card-right`
- `hover-card-sm`
- `hover-card-md`
- `hover-card-lg`
- `hover-card-delay`
- `hover-card-compact`
- `hover-card-simple`
- `hover-card-open`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="hover-card">
  <button class="px-3 py-2 border rounded-md bg-background">悬停查看</button>
  <div class="hover-card-content">
    <div class="hover-card-header">
      <div class="hover-card-title">Hover Card 标题</div>
      <div class="hover-card-description">这是一个简单的悬浮卡片描述。</div>
    </div>
    <div class="hover-card-body">内容区域可以放置任意文字、图片或操作按钮。</div>
  </div>
</div>
```

---

### progress
进度条组件，用于展示任务或操作的完成进度。

[progress docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/progress)

**Usage:** 常用于加载状态、上传进度、任务执行等场景。

#### Class Names
- `progress`
- `progress-bar`
- `progress-primary`
- `progress-secondary`
- `progress-accent`
- `progress-info`
- `progress-success`
- `progress-warning`
- `progress-error`
- `progress-xs`
- `progress-sm`
- `progress-md`
- `progress-lg`
- `progress-xl`
- `progress-animated`
- `progress-striped`
- `progress-striped-animated`
- `progress-indeterminate`
- `progress-rounded-none`
- `progress-rounded-sm`
- `progress-rounded-md`
- `progress-rounded-lg`
- `progress-rounded-full`
- `progress-bordered`
- `progress-gradient`
- `progress-gradient-success`
- `progress-gradient-warning`
- `progress-gradient-error`
- `progress-glow`
- `progress-vertical`
- `progress-vertical-xs`
- `progress-vertical-sm`
- `progress-vertical-md`
- `progress-vertical-lg`
- `progress-vertical-xl`
- `progress-labeled`
- `progress-segmented`
- `progress-circle`
- `progress-circle-sm`
- `progress-circle-lg`
- `progress-container`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="progress w-full">
  <div class="progress-bar"></div>
</div>
```

---

### skeleton
骨架屏组件，用于在加载内容时显示占位。

[skeleton docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/skeleton)

**Usage:** 常用于页面或卡片加载等待时，提升用户体验。

#### Class Names
- `skeleton`
- `skeleton-wave`
- `skeleton-pulse`
- `skeleton-text`
- `skeleton-text-sm`
- `skeleton-text-lg`
- `skeleton-text-xl`
- `skeleton-title`
- `skeleton-title-sm`
- `skeleton-title-lg`
- `skeleton-avatar`
- `skeleton-avatar-sm`
- `skeleton-avatar-lg`
- `skeleton-avatar-xl`
- `skeleton-circle`
- `skeleton-square`
- `skeleton-rect`
- `skeleton-image`
- `skeleton-card`
- `skeleton-thumbnail`
- `skeleton-button`
- `skeleton-button-sm`
- `skeleton-button-lg`
- `skeleton-input`
- `skeleton-input-sm`
- `skeleton-input-lg`
- `skeleton-badge`
- `skeleton-paragraph`
- `skeleton-list-item`
- `skeleton-card-layout`
- `skeleton-static`
- `skeleton-rounded-none`
- `skeleton-rounded-sm`
- `skeleton-rounded-md`
- `skeleton-rounded-lg`
- `skeleton-rounded-xl`
- `skeleton-rounded-full`
- `skeleton-container`
- `skeleton-table-row`
- `skeleton-progress`
- `skeleton-tag`
- `skeleton-rating`
- `skeleton-primary`
- `skeleton-secondary`
- `skeleton-user-card`
- `skeleton-article`
- `skeleton-comment`
- `skeleton-responsive`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="flex flex-col gap-4 bg-card p-6 rounded-lg">
  <div class="skeleton w-full h-8"></div>
  <div class="skeleton-text w-1/2"></div>
  <div class="skeleton-paragraph">
    <div></div>
    <div></div>
    <div></div>
  </div>
</div>
```

---

### toast
吐司提示组件，用于全局信息提示或短暂反馈。

[toast docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/toast)

**Usage:** 适用于操作结果反馈，如保存成功、删除失败等。

#### Class Names
- `toast`
- `toast-title`
- `toast-message`
- `toast-close`
- `toast-info`
- `toast-success`
- `toast-warning`
- `toast-error`
- `toast-filled`
- `toast-bordered`
- `toast-sm`
- `toast-lg`
- `toast-no-icon`
- `toast-enter`
- `toast-enter-active`
- `toast-enter-to`
- `toast-leave`
- `toast-leave-active`
- `toast-leave-to`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="toast toast-info">
  <div>
    <div class="toast-title">信息</div>
    <div class="toast-message">这是一条普通提示消息。</div>
  </div>
  <div class="toast-close"></div>
</div>
```

---

### tooltip
工具提示组件，用于在悬停或聚焦时显示辅助信息。

[tooltip docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/tooltip)

**Usage:** 常用于按钮、图标、文本等元素的提示说明。

#### Class Names
- `tooltip`
- `tooltip-top`
- `tooltip-bottom`
- `tooltip-left`
- `tooltip-right`
- `tooltip-primary`
- `tooltip-secondary`
- `tooltip-accent`
- `tooltip-destructive`
- `tooltip-sm`
- `tooltip-lg`
- `tooltip-no-arrow`
- `tooltip-open`
- `tooltip-delay`
- `tooltip-wrap`
- `tooltip-w-sm`
- `tooltip-w-md`
- `tooltip-w-lg`
- `tooltip-fade`
- `tooltip-scale`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="tooltip tooltip-top">
  <button class="btn">上方提示</button>
  <div class="tooltip-content">这是顶部提示内容</div>
</div>
```

### checkbox
多选框组件，用于多项选择或状态切换。

[checkbox docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/checkbox)

**Usage:** 常用于表单、多选列表、设置项中。

#### Class Names
- `checkbox`
- `checkbox-primary`
- `checkbox-secondary`
- `checkbox-accent`
- `checkbox-destructive`
- `checkbox-sm`
- `checkbox-md`
- `checkbox-lg`
- `checkbox-xl`
- `checkbox-thick`
- `checkbox-animated`
- `checkbox-card`
- `checkbox-group`

#### Syntax
```html
<label class="checkbox">
  <input type="checkbox" />
  <span class="checkbox-label">默认复选框</span>
</label>
```

---

### fieldset
字段集组件，用于分组相关表单控件。

[fieldset docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/fieldset)

**Usage:** 常用于表单逻辑分区、配置组、调查表。

#### Class Names
- `fieldset`
- `fieldset-plain`
- `fieldset-card`
- `fieldset-primary`
- `fieldset-secondary`
- `fieldset-accent`
- `fieldset-destructive`
- `fieldset-sm`
- `fieldset-md`
- `fieldset-lg`
- `fieldset-with-icon`
- `fieldset-collapsible`
- `fieldset-divided`
- `fieldset-grid`
- `fieldset-grid-2`
- `fieldset-grid-3`
- `fieldset-inline`
- `fieldset-compact`
- `fieldset-border-dashed`
- `fieldset-border-dotted`
- `fieldset-border-thick`
- `fieldset-border-left`
- `fieldset-border-left-secondary`
- `fieldset-border-left-accent`
- `fieldset-border-left-destructive`
- `fieldset-border-top`
- `fieldset-error`
- `fieldset-success`
- `fieldset-warning`
- `fieldset-required`
- `fieldset-label-inside`
- `fieldset-nested`
- `fieldset-disabled`

#### Syntax
```html
<fieldset class="fieldset">
  <legend>个人信息</legend>
  <div class="fieldset-description">请填写你的基本资料。</div>
  <div class="fieldset-content space-y-3">
    <input type="text" class="input w-full" placeholder="姓名" />
    <input type="email" class="input w-full" placeholder="邮箱" />
  </div>
</fieldset>
```

---

### file
文件选择组件，用于上传文件或图片。

[file docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/file)

**Usage:** 常用于用户上传、头像选择、附件提交等场景。

#### Class Names
- `file-input`
- `file-input-primary`
- `file-input-secondary`
- `file-input-accent`
- `file-input-destructive`
- `file-input-sm`
- `file-input-md`
- `file-input-lg`
- `file-input-custom`
- `file-input-dropzone`
- `file-input-dropzone-compact`
- `file-input-button`
- `file-input-button-primary`
- `file-input-button-secondary`
- `file-input-rounded-none`
- `file-input-rounded-sm`
- `file-input-rounded-lg`
- `file-input-rounded-full`
- `file-input-error`
- `file-input-success`
- `file-input-full`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="file-input file-input-primary">
  <input type="file" />
</div>
```

### filter
筛选器组件，用于多条件筛选或搜索结果过滤。

[filter docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/filter)

**Usage:** 常用于商品筛选、数据表格过滤等。

#### Class Names
- `filter-bar`
- `filter-bar-compact`
- `filter-bar-ghost`
- `filter-group`
- `filter-group-vertical`
- `filter-dropdown-trigger`
- `filter-dropdown-trigger-active`
- `filter-dropdown-icon`
- `filter-clear`
- `filter-search`
- `filter-search-input`
- `filter-search-icon`
- `filter-count`
- `filter-item`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="filter-bar">
  <div class="filter-item" data-active="true">全部</div>
  <div class="filter-item">未处理</div>
  <div class="filter-item">已完成</div>
</div>
```

---

### input
输入框组件，用于文本、数字等数据输入。

[input docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/input)

**Usage:** 常用于表单、搜索栏、配置项等。

#### Class Names
- `input`
- `input-xs`
- `input-sm`
- `input-md`
- `input-lg`
- `input-xl`
- `input-primary`
- `input-secondary`
- `input-destructive`
- `input-ghost`
- `input-filled`
- `input-bordered`
- `input-borderless`
- `input-group`

#### Syntax
```html
<input class="input" value="默认值" />
```

---

### label
表单标签组件，用于标识输入字段。

[label docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/label)

**Usage:** 常用于 input、select、textarea 前的说明文字。

#### Class Names
- `label`
- `label-required`
- `label-description`
- `label-inline`
- `label-xs`
- `label-sm`
- `label-md`
- `label-lg`
- `label-float`
- `label-float-required`
- `label-float-error`
- `label-float-success`
- `label-float-sm`
- `label-float-lg`
- `label-float-icon`
- `label-float-outlined`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="label">
  <input type="text" placeholder=" " id="float1" />
  <label for="float1">用户名</label>
</div>
```

---

### number
数字输入组件，用于输入或调整数值。

[number docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/number)

**Usage:** 常用于数量、价格、步进值输入等。

#### Class Names
- `input-number`
- `input-number`
- `input-number`
- `input-number-disabled`
- `input-number-separated`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="flex flex-nowrap items-center gap-4">
  <div class="input-number">
    <button>-</button>
    <input type="number" value="1" />
    <button>+</button>
  </div>
  <input type="text" class="input" value="正常的input" />
</div>
```

---

### radio
单选按钮组件，用于互斥选择。

[radio docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/radio)

**Usage:** 常用于表单单选、性别选择、选项组。

#### Class Names
- `radio`
- `radio-primary`
- `radio-secondary`
- `radio-accent`
- `radio-success`
- `radio-warning`
- `radio-error`
- `radio-xs`
- `radio-sm`
- `radio-md`
- `radio-lg`
- `radio-xl`
- `radio-group`
- `radio-group-inline`
- `radio-card`
- `radio-button`
- `radio-button-group`
- `radio-description`
- `radio-icon`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="radio-group-inline">
  <input type="radio" id="r1" name="r" class="radio" checked />
  <input type="radio" id="r2" name="r" class="radio" />
  <input type="radio" id="r3" name="r" class="radio" disabled />
</div>
```

---

### range
滑块组件，用于选择范围或调节数值。

[range docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/range)

**Usage:** 常用于音量、亮度、进度控制等场景。

#### Class Names
- `range`
- `range-xs`
- `range-sm`
- `range-md`
- `range-lg`
- `range-xl`
- `range-primary`
- `range-secondary`
- `range-destructive`
- `range-accent`
- `range-muted`
- `range-no-fill`
- `range-no-thumb`
- `range-square-thumb`
- `range-square-track`
- `range-stepped`

#### Syntax
```html
<input type="range" min="0" max="100" class="range" />
```

---

### rating
评分组件，用于展示或收集用户评分。

[rating docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/rating)

**Usage:** 常用于商品评价、反馈评分。

#### Class Names
- `rating`
- `rating-xs`
- `rating-sm`
- `rating-md`
- `rating-lg`
- `rating-xl`
- `rating-heart`
- `rating-half`
- `rating-readonly`
- `rating-hidden`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="rating" name="rating-basic">
  <input type="radio" name="rating-basic" />
  <input type="radio" name="rating-basic" />
  <input type="radio" name="rating-basic" />
  <input type="radio" name="rating-basic" />
  <input type="radio" name="rating-basic" />
</div>
```

---

### select
下拉选择组件，用于从多个选项中选择一个。

[select docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/select)

**Usage:** 常用于表单、过滤器、设置项。

#### Class Names
- `select`
- `select-primary`
- `select-secondary`
- `select-accent`
- `select-destructive`
- `select-xs`
- `select-sm`
- `select-md`
- `select-lg`
- `select-xl`
- `select-wide`
- `select-ghost`
- `select-bordered`
- `select-borderless`
- `select-wrapper`
- `select-group`
- `select-labeled`
- `select-multiple`
- `select-optgroup`
- `select-option`

#### Syntax
```html
<select class="select">
  <option>默认选择</option>
  <option>选项 A</option>
  <option>选项 B</option>
</select>
```

---

### textarea
多行文本输入框组件，用于输入较长的文本。

[textarea docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/textarea)

**Usage:** 常用于留言、评论、表单输入等场景。

#### Class Names
- `textarea`
- `textarea-primary`
- `textarea-secondary`
- `textarea-accent`
- `textarea-xs`
- `textarea-sm`
- `textarea-md`
- `textarea-lg`
- `textarea-xl`
- `textarea-h-auto`
- `textarea-h-sm`
- `textarea-h-md`
- `textarea-h-lg`
- `textarea-h-full`
- `textarea-resize-none`
- `textarea-resize-y`
- `textarea-resize-x`
- `textarea-resize`
- `textarea-ghost`
- `textarea-bordered`
- `textarea-borderless`
- `textarea-wrapper`
- `textarea-counter`
- `textarea-icon`
- `textarea-code`
- `textarea-auto`

#### Syntax
```html
<textarea class="textarea" placeholder="请输入内容..."></textarea>
```

---

### toggle
开关组件，用于开/关状态切换。

[toggle docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/toggle)

**Usage:** 常用于设置项、权限控制、模式切换。

#### Class Names
- `toggle`
- `toggle-primary`
- `toggle-secondary`
- `toggle-accent`
- `toggle-destructive`
- `toggle-xs`
- `toggle-sm`
- `toggle-md`
- `toggle-lg`

#### Syntax
```html
<input type="checkbox" class="toggle" />
```

---

### validator
表单验证反馈组件，用于显示输入错误或成功提示。

[validator docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/validator)

**Usage:** 常用于输入框下方的验证状态提示。

#### Class Names
- `validator`
- `validator-hint`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="validator">
  <label for="input-default">默认输入</label>
  <input id="input-default" class="input" placeholder="请输入内容..." />
  <div class="validator-hint">这是错误提示</div>
</div>
```

---

### divider
分隔线组件，用于分隔内容区域或元素。

[divider docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/divider)

**Usage:** 常用于区分不同的模块、卡片内容、标题下划线等。

#### Class Names
- `divider`
- `divider-horizontal`
- `divider-vertical`
- `divider-primary`
- `divider-muted`
- `divider-accent`
- `divider-destructive`
- `divider-start`
- `divider-end`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="divider">分割文本</div>
<div class="divider"></div>
```

---

### drawer
抽屉组件，用于从页面边缘滑出的内容区域。

[drawer docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/drawer)

**Usage:** 常用于侧边菜单、设置面板、移动端导航。

#### Class Names
- `drawer`
- `drawer-content`
- `drawer-side`
- `drawer-toggle`
- `drawer-end`
- `drawer-open`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="drawer">
  <input id="drawer-left" type="checkbox" class="drawer-toggle" />
  <div class="drawer-content p-4 bg-muted">
    <label for="drawer-left" class="btn btn-primary mb-4">打开抽屉</label>
    <p>这里是主内容区，可以滚动显示页面内容。</p>
  </div>
  <div class="drawer-side">
    <label for="drawer-left" aria-label="close sidebar" class="drawer-overlay"></label>
    <ul class="menu bg-card min-h-full w-80 p-4">
      <li class="cursor-pointer hover:bg-muted p-2 rounded">菜单项 1</li>
      <li class="cursor-pointer hover:bg-muted p-2 rounded">菜单项 2</li>
      <li class="cursor-pointer hover:bg-muted p-2 rounded">菜单项 3</li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>
```

---

### breadcrumb
面包屑导航组件，用于展示当前页面的层级路径。

[breadcrumb docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/breadcrumb)

**Usage:** 常用于后台管理系统、层级页面导航。

#### Class Names
- `breadcrumb`
- `breadcrumb-sm`
- `breadcrumb-lg`
- `breadcrumb-slash`
- `breadcrumb-dot`
- `breadcrumb-chevron`

#### Syntax
```html
<nav class="breadcrumb">
  <ul>
    <li><a href="#">首页</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">分类</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">产品</a></li>
    <li><a href="#" class="text-muted-foreground">详情</a></li>
  </ul>
</nav>
```

---

### dock
停靠栏组件，用于固定在页面边缘的导航或工具栏。

[dock docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/dock)

**Usage:** 常用于底部导航栏、悬浮操作条、快捷工具区。

#### Class Names
- `dock`
- `dock-label`
- `dock-active`
- `dock-xs`
- `dock-sm`
- `dock-md`
- `dock-lg`
- `dock-xl`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="dock">
<button>
  <Home class="size-5" />
  <span class="dock-label">首页</span>
</button>
<button>
  <Search class="size-5" />
  <span class="dock-label">搜索</span>
</button>
<button>
  <User class="size-5" />
  <span class="dock-label">我的</span>
</button>
</div>
```

---

### menu
菜单组件，用于导航链接、操作项或列表展示。

[menu docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/menu)

**Usage:** 常用于侧边栏、下拉菜单、导航栏中的菜单项。

#### Class Names
- `menu`
- `menu-title`
- `menu-horizontal`
- `menu-vertical`
- `menu-xs`
- `menu-sm`
- `menu-md`
- `menu-lg`
- `menu-xl`
- `menu-active`

#### Syntax
```html
<ul class="menu bg-card border rounded-lg w-56">
  <li class="menu-title">主导航</li>
  <li><a>首页</a></li>
  <li><a class="menu-active">消息中心</a></li>
  <li><a>设置</a></li>
  <li></li>
  <li class="menu-title">辅助功能</li>
  <li><a>帮助中心</a></li>
  <li class="menu-disabled"><a>禁用选项</a></li>
</ul>
```

---

### navbar
顶部导航栏组件，用于页面的主导航区域。

[navbar docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/navbar)

**Usage:** 常用于站点头部、应用顶部菜单。

#### Class Names
- `navbar`
- `navbar-start`
- `navbar-center`
- `navbar-end`
- `navbar-brand`
- `navbar-nav`
- `navbar-link`
- `navbar-fixed-top`
- `navbar-fixed-bottom`
- `navbar-sticky`
- `navbar-glass`
- `navbar-borderless`
- `navbar-shadow`
- `navbar-primary`
- `navbar-sm`
- `navbar-lg`
- `navbar-compact`
- `navbar-divider`
- `navbar-responsive`
- `navbar-search`
- `navbar-search-input`
- `navbar-dropdown`
- `navbar-dropdown-toggle`
- `navbar-dropdown-icon`
- `navbar-mobile`
- `navbar-mobile-toggle`
- `navbar-mobile-menu`
- `navbar-container`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="navbar navbar-shadow">
  <!-- 左侧 -->
  <div class="navbar-start">
    <a href="#" class="navbar-brand">TechCorp</a>
    <span class="navbar-divider"></span>
    <div class="navbar-nav hidden md:flex">
      <a href="#" class="navbar-link active">产品</a>
      <a href="#" class="navbar-link">解决方案</a>
      <a href="#" class="navbar-link">定价</a>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- 右侧 -->
  <div class="navbar-end">
    <div class="navbar-search hidden lg:flex">
      <input class="navbar-search-input" placeholder="搜索..." />
    </div>

    <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary hidden md:inline-flex">
      开始使用
    </button>

    <button class="btn btn-ghost btn-icon md:hidden">菜单</button>
  </div>
</div>
```

---

### pagination
分页导航组件，用于翻页或数据浏览控制。

[pagination docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/pagination)

**Usage:** 常用于表格、列表或内容分页。

#### Class Names
- `pagination`
- `pagination-btn`
- `pagination-link`
- `pagination-active`
- `pagination-xs`
- `pagination-sm`
- `pagination-md`
- `pagination-lg`
- `pagination-xl`
- `pagination-ellipsis`
- `pagination-prev`
- `pagination-next`
- `pagination-rounded`
- `pagination-square`
- `pagination-borderless`
- `pagination-ghost`
- `pagination-compact`
- `pagination-simple`
- `pagination-info`
- `pagination-centered`
- `pagination-start`
- `pagination-end`
- `pagination-between`

#### Syntax
```html
<div class="pagination pagination-centered">
  <button class="pagination-prev">‹</button>
  <button class="pagination-btn">1</button>
  <button class="pagination-btn" aria-current="page">2</button>
  <button class="pagination-btn">3</button>
  <span class="pagination-ellipsis">…</span>
  <button class="pagination-btn">10</button>
  <button class="pagination-next">›</button>
</div>
```

---

### tab
选项卡组件，用于在同一区域切换不同内容。

[tab docs](https://yami.yuelili.com/tab)

**Usage:** 常用于内容切换、面板切换、表单分步界面。

#### Class Names
- `tabs`
- `tabs-primary`
- `tab-title`
- `tab-content`
- `tabs-bordered`
- `tabs-boxed`
- `tabs-lifted`
- `tabs-sm`
- `tabs-md`
- `tabs-lg`

#### Rules
-
